ygData.subject: Re: EQ Report
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think I am going to have it based off of the origin of EQ. I m probably going to do something describing the races, dieties, careers, and equipment. My
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think I am going to have it based off of
the origin of EQ. I'm probably going to do something
describing the races, dieties, careers, and equipment. My
school has a SmartBoard that they project screens on
with a projector hooked up to a computer's video card.
I could possibly do the PowerPoint (PP)
presentation with this, but I've never used PP. I have Office
2000 Premium, and I have PP, but I've never used it.
The report should be at least 5 mins long, and I have
to make an outline as well. I'll try tinkering
around w/ PP, and see what I can do. If you can give me
any info, or help me out with a PP presentation,
reply or email me directly at safritz@...
